name: In re Nominating Petition of Philip J. BERG for Judge of the Common Pleas Court of Montgomery County, Pennsylvania, Objection of Brian Miles. Appeal of Philip J. Berg

parties: In re Nominating Petition of Philip J. BERG for Judge of the Common Pleas Court of Montgomery County, Pennsylvania, Objection of Brian Miles. Appeal of Philip J. Berg.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of April, 2009, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
971 A.2d 486
In re Nominating Petition of Philip J. BERG for Judge of the Common Pleas Court of Montgomery County, Pennsylvania, Objection of Brian Miles. Appeal of Philip J. Berg.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 27, 2009.
